Package PDFjet.NET

Class Chart

  • Object
    • PDFjet.NET.Chart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable
    public class Chart
extends Object
implements IDrawable
    Used to create XY chart objects and draw them on a page. Please see Example_09.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Chart​(Font f1, Font f2)
      Create a XY chart object.

        public float[] DrawOn​(Page page)
               throws Exception
        Draws this chart on the specified page.
        Specified by:
        DrawOn in interface IDrawable
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        x and y coordinates of the bottom right corner of this component.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the draw method did not succeed.
